****************************** Readme Master ********************************

Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Sang Wook Kim 				     swkim@sanda.sait.samsung.co.kr
Samsung A. I. T. (SAIT)
DSP Lab.,SAIT, P.O. Box 111, Suwon, KOREA 440-600    fax:   +82-331-280-9207
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test14"
	"Test14" means the 14th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test14.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test14_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test14_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test14_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test14_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test14_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					3
	extension				no
	transmission channel allocation		-
	phantom center				no
	prediction				no
	dynamic cross talk			no
	sampling freq.				44.1k
	LFE					no
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				yes
	bitrate base stream			384kbps
	bitrate extension stream		-
	configuration				3/2
